item.title: Least Commitment Planning for the Object Scouting Problem
item.description: TL;DR – This paper introduces a new planning framework specifically designed for object scouting with LOMDPs called the Scouting Partial-Order Planner (SPOP), which exploits the characteristics of partial order and regression planning to plan around gaps in knowledge the robot may have about the existence, location, and state of relevant objects in its environment.
